snippet: Cerberus Capital Management, a private equity firm, said it would sell the maker of the rifle used in the school shootings as California on Tuesday sought tighter regulations on the sale of ammunition.
abstract: Cerberus Capital Management, a private equity firm, said it would sell the maker of the rifle used in the school shootings as California on Tuesday sought tighter regulations on the sale of ammunition.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and ADAM NAGOURNEY

headline.main: Reaction to Newtown Shootings Spreads to Corporate America
